name: 郭政淳
objective: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調機電專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
schedule:
Wk1    Orientation
Wk2    Modern Transportation
Wk3    The Process of Measurement
Wk4    The Finite Element Method
Wk5    Resources of Minerals and Energy
Wk6    Writing Emails (I)
Wk7    Introducing Nano
Wk8    Presenting Graphs and Tables
Wk9    English Midterm Exam-No Class
Wk10    A Perspective on Feedback Control
Wk11    Material Science and Engineering
Wk12    Pathways to a Clean Energy System
Wk13    Optimum Design Problem Formation
Wk14    Writing Emails (II)
Wk15    Presentation Skills
Wk16    Student Presentation
Wk17    Review
Wk18    English Final Exam-No Class
scorePolicy:
Attendance & Participation: 20%
Quizzes & Assignments: 30%
Midterm & Final Exams: 30%
Presentation & Peer Review: 20%
materials: ESP Series (北科之英) for College of Mechanical Engineering. Book 1 & 2. Manuscript. Department of English, NTUT.
